content: मूर्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [मुर्च्छ्-क्तिन्] {@--1@} Anything which has definite shape and limits, material element, matter, substance. {@--2@} A form, visible shape, body, figure; <ls>Mu. 2. 2</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 27</ls>; <ls n="R.">14. 54.</ls> {@--3@} An embodiment, incarnation, personification, manifestation; करुणस्य मूर्तिः <ls>U. 3. 4</ls>; <ls>Pt. 2. 159.</ls> {@--4@} An image, idol, a statue. {@--5@} Beauty. {@--6@} Solidity, hardness.
